name: Where Is Sarah?
description:
Where Is Sarah?

Overview:
This game is first-person walker simulation, and also indie one with horror theme. Player shall look around the house and aisles. To get player immersed in the game, it has some puzzles, and also chase scenes for making player feel thrilled and nervous at the same time.

During the chase scene, player can be away as much as possible by using tools and terrains nearby, however, still it is difficult to some degree.

Synopsis:
You will open your eyes at the rural town called "Cotswolds", and as "Brian", the office worker and husband of Sarah, settled on this area. One day, Sarah saw the pale and white human shape in the middle of the woods...
Shady man assaulted on her, so Sarah is missing. You have checked on every single spot and your own house for a month but couldn't find anything, thus only regret and guilt left around you. You've boozed all day and every morning and night to forget that sorrow and your mind is no more sane like before.
Not sure why but maybe because of that, sometimes weird things started to show themselves to your eyes, and then eventually began to stalk you. Once you get your mind again, the doubt began to grow inside of you with distrusting what you believed as happened might be true or not. After all of these things, unknown guy called on you so you shall go for the journey away...

Playtime of this game is minimum 45 minutes ~ to maximum 2 hours.
